meanings.definition: The action of dividing into degrees or other proportionate divisions.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the graduations of the circle were clearly marked.
meanings.sent2: She attended multiple graduations to celebrate her friends' achievements.
meanings.sent3: The cake was cut into perfect graduations, making it easy to share.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness showed in the graduations of his muscle definition.
meanings.sent5: The graduations on the ruler helped the students measure accurately.

meanings.definition: The process of receiving an academic degree or diploma.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, her graduation finally arrived.
meanings.sent2: The graduation ceremony was a proud moment for all the students.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his graduation from pizza eating should earn him a diploma.
meanings.sent4: Her graduation from beginner to expert was a journey of growth.
meanings.sent5: The graduation marked the beginning of her new career path.

meanings.definition: The marks on an instrument or vessel indicating degrees or quantity.
meanings.sent1: The graduations on the thermometer showed the rising temperature.
meanings.sent2: The graduations on the measuring cup helped her follow the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The graduations on the fuel gauge warned him of low gas levels.
meanings.sent4: The graduations on the map guided them through the unfamiliar terrain.
meanings.sent5: The graduations on the clock indicated the passing hours.
